labels.otherNameCaption: Maiden name/married name, use name, pseudo

status.label: Are you a politically exposed person?
status.tooltipTitle: Who is a politically exposed person?
status.tooltipDescription: Persons who exercise, or have ceased to exercise, political, jurisdictional or administrative functions on behalf of France, a foreign State or an international organization, as well as their relatives.

options.three: I’m closed to a politically exposed person (partner, child or relative)

pepFullName.label: Name of the politically exposed person

options.one: Head of state, head of government, member of a national government or of the European Commission
options.two: Member of a national parliamentary assembly (deputy as well as senator) or of the European Parliament, leader of a political party
options.three: Magistrate of the Court of Cassation, State Councilor and member of the Constitutional Council or their equivalents abroad
options.four: Magistrate of the Court of Auditors or their equivalents abroad
options.five: Executive officer or member of the governing body of a central bank
options.seven: General officer, or senior officer in command of an army
options.eight: Member of an administrative, management or supervisory body of a public enterprise operating at national level
options.nine: Director, deputy director, member of the board of an international organization

endDate.label: End date (optional)
endDate.caption: If this is not your occupation anymore

options.one: Partner (Spouse or common-law partner; partner bound by a civil solidarity pact or by a partnership contract registered under foreign law)
options.two: Child of this person, as well as their spouse (regardless of the nature of the alliance)

validate.title: Your information
validate.description: Please check and complete the information if required.

waitingForValidation.title: Thank you, we are now processing your information
waitingForValidation.description: We will get back to you within the next 5 minutes to 48 hours.

welcomeBack.title: You’re almost finished!
welcomeBack.description: We need additional information to validate your identity
